text:
Master Marrath is an instructor for the [[Martial Temple of Dol Arrah]] in [[Starilaskur]], [[Breland]]. They are a 300-year-old [[elf]] who teaches Vassal History and World Religions.

!! Appearance and Personality 

Despite their old age, Master Marrath is sinewy and strong. They are always clean and well-groomed, and are quietly devout. They always correct grammatical errors; they learned how to speak and write [[Common]] nearly 300 years ago, and have strong opinions about popular movements within the language since then, so some of their "corrections" might be old-fashioned and outdated.
title: Marrath
tags: Starilaskur humanoid [[Martial Temple of Dol Arrah]] elf
